issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Testing euca-register on Eucalyptus, we allow registration of the same name for an image.  This breaks AWS compatibility.

*Eucalyptus*

{code}
[hspencer@odc-d-06-07 ~]$ euca-register -n raring-multiname-test raring-multiregistername-test/raring-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.manifest.xml --debug
2013-07-25 20:14:46,912 DEBUG   RegisterImage parsed arguments: {'BlockDeviceMapping': [], 'Description': None, 'url': None, 'key_id': None, 'shell_configfile': '', 'userregion': None, 'snapshot': None, 'Architecture': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'ImageLocation': 'raring-multiregistername-test/raring-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.manifest.xml', 'KernelId': None, 'RamdiskId': None, 'secret_key': None, 'deprecated_key_id': None, 'RootDeviceName': None, 'Name': 'raring-multiname-test'}

Client.InvalidAMIName.Duplicate: AMI name raring-master is already in use by AMI ami-1ba5de72
{code}
fields.summary: Eucalyptus allows euca-register to use the same name for image registration
fields.environment:
*non-HA*

* 1 x CLC,Walrus
* 1 x CC, SC
* 1 x NC
* Managed Mode

comments.body: Attached sosreport that contains logs, DB dump, and additional information from the CLC/Walrus machine.
Reverting to investigating so it hit the ENG bug scrub
Reopening issue so that it hits the Engineering bug scrub.
Does EC2 compare against all visible images' names or just those from the same account?
Confirmed with EC2 that the names can't be the same within the account. They can be across accounts.
